'''''Let's Make A Flower Garland!''''' is a weekly [[Reputation Request]] that occurs in [[Liyue]].

==Step==
# Give [[Changchang]] three [[Silk Flower]]s

==Request Details==
Help Needed:<br />
I want to help Daddy make a flower garland!<br />
Daddy says that he'll be back soon, and I want to send him a garland.<br />
I've already made most of the garland... but I wanna use some Silk Flowers to decorate it.<br />
If there's someone who doesn't mind helping, please find me {{Color|buzzword|three Silk Flowers}}.

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|[[Liyue Harbor]]'s [[Changchang]] needs three [[Silk Flower]]s.}}
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Talk to Changchang)
:'''Changchang:''' When is daddy coming back... Oh, hello, nice to meet you!
:{{DIcon|Quest}} About Silk Flowers...
:'''Changchang:''' Huh? Did you see that thing I wrote? Wow, that worked better than I thought...
:'''Changchang:''' So did you already finish gathering three Silk Flowers?
:{{DIcon|Quest}} Here they are.
:;(Opens item submission menu)
::'''Changchang:''' These Silk Flowers should be just the right amount. My garland will be done in no time now!
::'''Changchang:''' Thank you. Here, these are for you.
::'''Changchang:''' I know Daddy will just love this pretty garland.
:{{DIcon}} Not yet...
::'''Changchang:''' Okay... But remember to bring them right back to me as soon as you've got 'em. I'm going to make a pretty garland.
{{Dialogue end}}
